meanings.definition: A student or graduate of a preparatory school.
meanings.sent1: The preppie was proud to wear his school blazer.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was a preppie by the way he carried himself.
meanings.sent3: The preppie tried to impress everyone with his fancy tie.
meanings.sent4: She stood out like a preppie in a sea of casual attire.
meanings.sent5: The preppie's school spirit was contagious among his classmates.

meanings.definition: A person who dresses or behaves in a manner associated with wealthy, upper-class individuals.
meanings.sent1: The preppie always wore designer clothes to school.
meanings.sent2: He looked like a preppie straight out of a fashion magazine.
meanings.sent3: The preppie's outfit cost more than my entire wardrobe!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a preppie walking down the red carpet.
meanings.sent5: His preppie style turned heads wherever he went.
